sections.instructor: Staff, SRC, Prerequisite: Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process or completion of a course taught at or above the level of intermediate algebra. Note: Graphing calculator, computer, or other technology required. Note: Partially online course. In addition to online instruction, this course has mandatory in-person meetings for exams on Wednesdays from 4:05-6:10pm on 2/25, 4/8 (exams) and 5/20 (final) on campus. All other instruction provided online through the college learning management system Canvas.  On the course start date, log into Canvas, www.dvc.edu/online to locate course.

Staff, SRC, Prerequisite: Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process or completion of a course taught at or above the level of intermediate algebra. Note: Graphing calculator, computer, or other technology required. Note: Partially online course. In addition to online instruction, this course has mandatory in-person meetings for exams on Thursdays from 7:00-9:00pm on 3/5, 4/23 (exams) and 5/21 (final) on campus. All other instruction will be provided via the internet through the college learning management system CANVAS and Zoom software. Meets online weekly on Tuesday and Thursdays 7:00-8:15PM for live lecture. Access to a computer with audio and video capability is required. Go to www.dvc.edu/online for course access information.

McCarter, Sarah, Prerequisite: Placement as determined by the college's multiple measures assessment process or completion of a course taught at or above the level of intermediate algebra. Note: Graphing calculator, computer, or other technology required. Note: This section is a required part of the second semester of DVC's Academy for Student Athletes. Students must be a current student athlete to enroll. In addition to STAT-C1000-6202, students should also enroll in ENGL-126-6050 For registration information, please contact Katy Agnost and Ervin Anderson. Note: Class meets on campus as scheduled.
